header.tepa-description: Technopark, our school's multifunctional resource center, is dedicated to providing a seamless and enhanced school experience. From high-quality uniforms and comprehensive office supplies to electronics and efficient fee payment through the mini bank, along with photocopy services and expert educational travel planning, Tec   hnopark is your one-stop destination for academic and administrative support, aiming to elevate every aspect of your school journey.
